Uses of Class
MainGameLogic.RandomEvents

Packages that use RandomEvents
Package Description
MainGameLogic  

  • Uses of RandomEvents in MainGameLogic

    Methods in MainGameLogic that return RandomEvents
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    RandomEvents GameLogic.sail​(int newIslandIndex, int routeRisk)
    Sails the player to a new island but also determines the event that occurs during the journey.
    Methods in MainGameLogic with parameters of type RandomEvents
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GameLogic.determinePirateGameActive​(RandomEvents event)
    During the pirate event if the player loses this method is used to determine if the player is allowed to live or not.
